snippet: The artist Pavel Maria Smejkal has reimagined a number of iconic photographs, encouraging a reconsideration of the role of the photographer.
abstract: The artist Pavel Maria Smejkal has reimagined a number of iconic photographs, encouraging a reconsideration of the role of the photographer.
lead_paragraph: An empty road during the Vietnam War. A hilltop landscape in Spain. A nondescript motel balcony in Memphis.
